name: Athame Artis
description: A precious sword gifted by the Day King to the brave hero in the little witch's story, only for the witch to take it and defeat the hero herself.
bonus:
CRIT DMG from Elemental Bursts is increased by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When an Elemental Burst hits an opponent, gain the Blade of the Daylight Hours effect: ATK is increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Nearby active party members other than the equipping character have their ATK increased by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% for 3s.
Additionally, when the party possesses Hexerei: Secret Rite effects, the effects of Blade of the Daylight Hours are increased by an additional 75%. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.
